isis.stitle: TSI 07-13-01 - Allison Transmission Fluid Specification Changes

geninfo.para: This TSI Letter applies to all models (bus, truck or stripped chassis) that can be ordered with an Allison transmission. There is a change in fluid specifications for certain Allison Transmission product families regardless of the model truck or bus it is installed in. The Donax TG fluid that Shell is currently supplying to our assembly plants meets the new Allison TES-389 spec. The current Donax TG fluid will be renamed to Donax TA-389. Dexron III is no longer available as of 01/01/2007 due to a licensing agreement . Refer to attached Allison document for product compatibility.
